name: Last Broadcast
description:
This is The Last Broadcast

Last Broadcast is an experimental narrative game set at a radio station at the end of the world. Players assume the role of D-Jay, a radio host, who is giving their last show as the sun turns red and the world burns down.

Key Features

  • Immersive Fiction: Encounter three callers each with their different goals and concerns.
  • Play Music: Choose from a selection of 15 musical artists to play within the radio station.
  • Play at your own Pace: The story (and the apocalypse) continues at your pace.
